title: Strengthening Systems Design Practical Competencies: Science Terminology Language Education Design Using Digital Games

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain 20 or more scientific terms using visual elements (images, animations) from digital games.
Learners can improve game content three or more times, incorporating peer feedback, through participation in service-learning projects.
Learners can analyze the effectiveness of game-based learning materials with 80% or higher accuracy using formative assessment tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
